name: totd_tracks_by_page
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trackmania.
Tool description: Get Stats, Matches and Leaderboards from Trackmania (Unofficial).
API description: Fetches the Track of the Day (TOTD) tracks from the Trackmania API by page number.

page.description: The result page, each containing 50 results. Default page is `0`.
